sn35.103:1.1: “Udako sudaṃ, bhikkhave, rāmaputto evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati:
sn35.103:1.2: ‘idaṃ jātu vedagū, idaṃ jātu sabbajī, idaṃ jātu apalikhataṃ gaṇḍamūlaṃ palikhaṇin’ti.
sn35.103:1.3: Taṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, udako rāmaputto avedagūyeva samāno ‘vedagūsmī’ti bhāsati, asabbajīyeva samāno ‘sabbajīsmī’ti bhāsati, apalikhataṃyeva gaṇḍamūlaṃ palikhataṃ me ‘gaṇḍamūlan’ti bhāsati.
sn35.103:1.4: Idha kho taṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn35.103:1.5: ‘idaṃ jātu vedagū, idaṃ jātu sabbajī, idaṃ jātu apalikhataṃ gaṇḍamūlaṃ palikhaṇin’ti.
sn35.103:2.2: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti;
sn35.103:2.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedagū hoti.
sn35.103:3.2: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā anupādāvimutto hoti;
sn35.103:3.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbajī hoti.
sn35.103:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno apalikhataṃ gaṇḍamūlaṃ palikhataṃ hoti?
sn35.103:4.2: Gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhave, imassetaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṃ mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassa.
sn35.103:4.4: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā pahīnā hoti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā;
sn35.103:4.5: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno apalikhataṃ gaṇḍamūlaṃ palikhataṃ hoti.
sn35.103:5.1: Udako sudaṃ, bhikkhave, rāmaputto evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati:
sn35.103:5.2: ‘idaṃ jātu vedagū, idaṃ jātu sabbajī, idaṃ jātu apalikhataṃ gaṇḍamūlaṃ palikhaṇin’ti.
sn35.103:5.3: Taṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, udako rāmaputto avedagūyeva samāno ‘vedagūsmī’ti bhāsati, asabbajīyeva samāno ‘sabbajīsmī’ti bhāsati;
sn35.103:5.5: Idha kho taṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn35.103:5.6: ‘idaṃ jātu vedagū, idaṃ jātu sabbajī, idaṃ jātu apalikhataṃ gaṇḍamūlaṃ palikhaṇin’”ti.
